trans-unit.target: 灵气阿托格最爱吃守护自己的灵气。

trans-unit.source: Celestial Dawn
trans-unit.target: 天界曙光

trans-unit.resname: TSB·3 | Celestial Dawn | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Lands you control are Plains.\nNonland cards you own that aren't in play, spells you control, and nonland permanents you control are white.\nYou may spend white mana as though it were mana of any color. You may spend other mana only as though it were colorless mana.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的地都是平原。 由你所拥有、且不在场上的非地牌，由你操控的咒语，以及由你操控的非地永久物都是白色。 你可以将白色法术力视为任意颜色的法术力来支付。 其它颜色的法术力只能视为无色法术力。

trans-unit.source: Consecrate Land

trans-unit.source: Enchant land\nEnchanted land is indestructible and can't be enchanted by other Auras.
trans-unit.target: 地结界 受此结界的地不会毁坏，且不能被其它灵气结附。

trans-unit.source: Defiant Vanguard
trans-unit.target: 无畏前锋

trans-unit.resname: TSB·5 | Defiant Vanguard | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME blocks, at end of combat, destroy it and all creatures it blocked this turn.\n{5}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel card with converted mana cost 4 or less and put it into play. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进行阻挡，在战斗结束时，消灭它及所有在本回合中被它阻挡的生物。 {5}，{T}：从你的牌库中搜寻一张总法术力费用等于或小于4的反抗军牌，并将其放置进场。 然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Enduring Renewal
trans-unit.target: 永续新机

trans-unit.resname: TSB·7 | Enduring Renewal | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Play with your hand revealed.\nIf you would draw a card, reveal the top card of your library instead. If it's a creature card, put it into your graveyard. Otherwise, draw a card.\nWhenever a creature is put into your graveyard from play, return it to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 你以展示手牌的方式进行游戏。 如果你将抓一张牌，则改为展示你的牌库顶牌。 若该牌是生物牌，则将它置入你的坟墓场。 若否，则抓一张牌。 每当一个生物从场上置入你的坟墓场时，将它移回你手上。

trans-unit.target: 每当一个裂片妖造成伤害时，其操控者获得等量的生命。

trans-unit.source: The slivers would survive, even at the expense of every other creature on Otaria.
trans-unit.target: 即使会以欧塔利亚所有他族为代价，裂片妖的生存意志依然强烈。

trans-unit.source: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to target creature or player this turn, prevent that damage. If damage from a red source is prevented this way, CARDNAME deals damage equal to the damage prevented this way to the source's controller.
trans-unit.target: 选择一个来源，于本回合中，防止该来源下一次将对目标生物或牌手造成的伤害 若以此法防止的伤害来源为红色，则CARDNAME对此来源的操控者造成伤害，其数量等同于以此法防止之伤害。

"Of twenty yeer of age he was, I gesse.

trans-unit.source: Once a vision of constancy in the sky, the moon had long been hidden from view by the haze that chokes the heavens. The very sight of it had become a sign that change was in the air.
trans-unit.target: 原本抬头可见的月亮，已被铺天盖地的尘雾掩盖许久。 现今若见到月亮，所象征的是大气有所改变。

trans-unit.source: Mystical Teachings
trans-unit.target: 神秘教谕

trans-unit.source: Search your library for an instant card or a card with flash, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.\nFlashback {5}{B} (You may play this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then remove it from the game.)

trans-unit.source: Paradox Haze
trans-unit.target: 奇诡迷雾

trans-unit.source: "Keep your pace steady through the haze, lest you step on the heels of your future self or trip the self a moment behind you."\n—Teferi
trans-unit.target: 「在迷雾中要放稳步调，以免踩到未来自己的脚跟，或是绊倒顷刻前的自己。」 ～泰菲力

trans-unit.target: 他们演化出的能力，能将其神经活动专注至同一脉动，造成裂物且自毁的灵能冲击。

At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When you remove the last, play it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

trans-unit.source: Clairvoyants across Dominaria were driven mad by the overload from the widening time rifts, while other random folk gained the gift of future sight.
trans-unit.target: 时间裂缝让多明纳里亚各地的洞察家因讯息超载而发狂，但某些常人却因此获得预知能力。

trans-unit.source: "What wears down my people most, I think, is not the danger, but the endless screeching outside our camp."\n—Merrik Aidar, Benalish patrol
trans-unit.target: 「要说最让我们疲弱的东西，我想并不是危险，而是营地外永无止境的尖鸣。」 ～宾纳里亚巡卫梅里可·艾达

trans-unit.source: Shadow Sliver

trans-unit.source: These slivers, trapped between worlds since the Rathi overlay, are among the last to claim direct lineage from the lost Sliver Queen.
trans-unit.target: 于瑞斯的时空覆盖中，这些裂片妖被囚于世间夹缝，是与已逝女王有直系血缘的末代裂片妖之一。

trans-unit.source: The brutish mage's version of thinking.

trans-unit.resname: TSP·100 | Cyclopean Giant | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from play, target land becomes a Swamp. Remove CARDNAME from the game.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME从场上置入坟墓场时，目标地成为沼泽。 将CARDNAME移出对战。

trans-unit.source: A tomb-eye may remain shut for centuries. It opens when it sees a world as twisted and hollow as the wretch beneath its lid.
trans-unit.target: 坟墓眼饰可以一连阖上几个世纪。 当它发现这世界与眼皮底下的卑劣者一样扭曲而空虚时，便将睁眼。

trans-unit.source: Dark Withering
trans-unit.target: 黯境枯萎

trans-unit.resname: TSP·101 | Dark Withering | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Destroy target nonblack creature.\nMadness {B} (If you discard this card, you may play it for its madness cost instead of putting it into your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标非黑色的生物。 疯魔{B}（如果你弃掉此牌，可以改为使用它并支付其疯魔费用，而非直接将它置入你的坟墓场。）

trans-unit.source: Deathspore Thallid
trans-unit.target: 死孢散绿菌

trans-unit.resname: TSP·102 | Deathspore Thallid | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on CARDNAME.\nRemove three spore counters from CARDNAME: Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token into play.\nSacrifice a Saproling: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，在CARDNAME上放置一个芽孢指示物。 从CARDNAME上移去三个芽孢指示物：将一个1/1绿色腐生物衍生物放置进场。 牺牲一个腐生物：目标生物得-1/-1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Demonic Collusion
trans-unit.target: 与魔共谋

trans-unit.resname: TSP·103 | Demonic Collusion | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Buyback—\nDiscard two cards. (You may discard two cards in addition to any other costs as you play this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)\nSearch your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 购回～弃两张牌。 （你使用此咒语时可以额外弃两张牌并支付任何其它费用。 若你如此做，则结算此咒语时将它放入你的手牌。） 从你的牌库中搜寻一张牌并置于你手上。 然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Dread Return
trans-unit.target: 颤栗再现

trans-unit.resname: TSP·104 | Dread Return | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Return target creature card from your graveyard to play.\nFlashback—\nSacrifice three creatures. (You may play this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then remove it from the game.)
trans-unit.target: 将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回场上。 返照～牺牲三个生物。 （你可以从你的坟墓场使用此牌，并支付其返照费用， 然后将它移出对战。）

trans-unit.source: Those who forget the horrors of the past are doomed to re-meet them.
trans-unit.target: 忘却过往梦魇的人，注定倒霉要再度碰上。

trans-unit.source: Drudge Reavers
trans-unit.target: 苦力裂肢兵

trans-unit.resname: TSP·105 | Drudge Reavers | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash (You may play this spell any time you could play an instant.)\n{B}: Regenerate CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 闪现（你可以于你能够使用瞬间的时机下使用此咒语。） {B}：重生CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: "The surface of the land is blanched with salt, but the soil beneath is reddened with death—a fertile ground for necromancy."\n—Lim-Dûl the Necromancer
trans-unit.target: 「地表覆满白盐，底下却是血壤一片～简直是死冥术的肥沃大地。」 ～死灵术士林杜

trans-unit.resname: TSP·106 | Endrek Sahr, Master Breeder | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Endrek Sahr, Master Breeder
trans-unit.target: 培育师恩德瑞克萨尔

trans-unit.resname: TSP·106 | Endrek Sahr, Master Breeder | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever you play a creature spell, put X 1/1 black Thrull creature tokens into play, where X is that spell's converted mana cost.\nWhen you control seven or more Thrulls, sacrifice CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 每当你使用生物咒语时，将X个1/1黑色索尔兽衍生物放置进场，X为该咒语的总法术力费用。 当你操控七个或更多索尔兽时，牺牲CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: TSP·107 | Evil Eye of Urborg | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Evil Eye of Urborg
trans-unit.target: 乌尔博格邪眼

trans-unit.resname: TSP·107 | Evil Eye of Urborg | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Non-Eye creatures you control can't attack.\nWhenever CARDNAME becomes blocked by a creature, destroy that creature.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控且不是眼的生物都不能进行攻击。 每当CARDNAME被生物阻挡时，消灭该生物。

trans-unit.resname: TSP·107 | Evil Eye of Urborg | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Edahlis, what *is* that thing? We should have stayed in Yavimaya . . . ."\n—Aznaph, greenseeker
trans-unit.target: 「艾达黎，那到底是什么？ 我们应该留在亚维马雅才对. . . .」～寻碧者阿那夫

trans-unit.source: Faceless Devourer
trans-unit.target: 无面吞噬兽

trans-unit.resname: TSP·108 | Faceless Devourer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)\nWhen CARDNAME comes into play, remove another target creature with shadow from the game.\nWhen CARDNAME leaves play, return the removed card to play under its owner's control.
trans-unit.target: 次元幽影（此生物只能阻挡具次元幽影异能的生物，亦只能被具此异能的生物阻挡。） 当CARDNAME进场时，将另一个目标具次元幽影异能的生物移出对战。 当CARDNAME离场时，将以此法移出对战的牌在其拥有者的操控下移回场上。

trans-unit.source: Fallen Ideal
trans-unit.target: 堕落理念

trans-unit.resname: TSP·109 | Fallen Ideal | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature has flying and "Sacrifice a creature: This creature gets +2/+1 until end of turn."\nWhen CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from play, return CARDNAME to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 生物结界 受此结界的生物具有飞行异能，且具有「牺牲一个生物：此生物得+2/+1直到回合结束。」 当CARDNAME从场上置入坟墓场时，将CARDNAME移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: Feebleness
trans-unit.target: 无力感

trans-unit.source: Flash (You may play this spell any time you could play an instant.)\nEnchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets -2/-1.
trans-unit.target: 闪现（你可以于你能够使用瞬间的时机下使用此咒语。） 生物结界 受此结界的生物得-2/-1。

trans-unit.source: Just a small touch of magic can harness the debilitating power of Urborg's poisonous winds.
trans-unit.target: 只要用点法术，就能驾驭乌尔博格的夺力毒风。

trans-unit.source: Gorgon Recluse
trans-unit.target: 隐遁蛇发妖

trans-unit.resname: TSP·111 | Gorgon Recluse | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME blocks or becomes blocked by a nonblack creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.\nMadness {B}{B} (If you discard this card, you may play it for its madness cost instead of putting it into your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME阻挡非黑色生物或被非黑色生物阻挡，在战斗结束时消灭该生物。 疯魔{B}{B}（如果你弃掉此牌，可以改为使用它并支付其疯魔费用，而非直接将它置入你的坟墓场。）

trans-unit.source: Haunting Hymn
trans-unit.target: 乱心赞歌

trans-unit.resname: TSP·112 | Haunting Hymn | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target player discards two cards. If you played this spell during your main phase, that player discards four cards instead.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手弃两张牌。 如果你在你的行动阶段使用此牌，则改为该牌手弃四张牌。

trans-unit.source: The hymn's melody has persisted since Tourach's time, but the words changed to invoke the phobias of each listener.
trans-unit.target: 这赞歌的旋律自妥拉克的时代以来都没变过，但词句则经历多次修改，藉以挑起听闻者最深的恐惧。

trans-unit.resname: TSP·113 | Liege of the Pit | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Liege of the Pit
trans-unit.target: 暗渊王侯

trans-unit.resname: TSP·113 | Liege of the Pit | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying, trample\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature other than CARDNAME. If you can't, CARDNAME deals 7 damage to you.\nMorph {B}{B}{B}{B} (You may play this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行，践踏 在你的维持开始时，牺牲一个CARDNAME以外的生物。 若你无法如此作，则CARDNAME对你造成7点伤害。 变身{B}{B}{B}{B}（你可牌面朝下地使用此牌并支付{3}，将其当成2/2生物。 可随时支付其变身费用使其翻回正面。）

trans-unit.resname: TSP·114 | Lim-Dûl the Necromancer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lim-Dûl the Necromancer
trans-unit.target: 死灵术士林杜

trans-unit.resname: TSP·114 | Lim-Dûl the Necromancer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature an opponent controls is put into a graveyard from play, you may pay {1}{B}. If you do, return that card to play under your control. If it's a creature, it's a Zombie in addition to its other creature types.\n{1}{B}: Regenerate target Zombie.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由对手操控的生物从场上置入坟墓场时，你可以支付{1}{B}。 若你如此作，将该牌在你的操控下返回场上。 若它是生物，则它额外具有「灵俑」此生物类别。 {1}{B}：重生目标灵俑。

trans-unit.source: Living End
trans-unit.target: 走骨行尸

trans-unit.resname: TSP·115 | Living End | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME is black.\nSuspend 3—{2}{B}{B}\nEach player removes all creature cards in his or her graveyard from the game, then sacrifices all creatures he or she controls, then puts into play all cards he or she removed this way.

trans-unit.resname: TSP·116 | Magus of the Mirror | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Magus of the Mirror
trans-unit.target: 崇镜贤者

trans-unit.resname: TSP·116 | Magus of the Mirror | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Exchange life totals with target opponent. Play this ability only during your upkeep.
trans-unit.target: {T}，牺牲CARDNAME：与目标对手交换总生命。 你只可以于你的维持中使用此异能。

trans-unit.resname: TSP·116 | Magus of the Mirror | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Behold! The image of the enemy and all that she has. Trust your envy, and take it."
trans-unit.target: 「看好了！ 这是敌人的样子，以及她拥有的东西。 依妒忌行事，全部接收下来吧。」

trans-unit.source: Mana Skimmer
trans-unit.target: 魔力飞掠者

trans-unit.resname: TSP·117 | Mana Skimmer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever CARDNAME deals damage to a player, tap target land that player controls. That land doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当CARDNAME对牌手造成伤害时，横置目标由该牌手操控的地。 该地于其操控者的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。

trans-unit.source: They traverse the mana-starved wastes in search of richer lands.
trans-unit.target: 他们横越法术力枯竭的荒野，寻觅丰沛大地。

trans-unit.source: Mindlash Sliver
trans-unit.target: 鞭灵裂片妖

trans-unit.resname: TSP·118 | Mindlash Sliver | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: All Slivers have "{1}, Sacrifice this creature: Each player discards a card."
trans-unit.target: 所有裂片妖具有「{1}，牺牲此生物：每位牌手弃一张牌。」

trans-unit.source: Though Dominaria's queenless slivers lack a single purpose, in some the instinct for self-sacrifice remains extremely strong.
trans-unit.target: 多明纳里亚的裂片妖没有女王，因此没有任何行动目标；因此某些品种的自我牺牲欲望依旧高涨。

trans-unit.source: Mindstab
trans-unit.target: 灵杀

trans-unit.source: Target player discards three cards.\nSuspend 4—{B} (Rather than play this card from your hand, you may pay {B} and remove it from the game with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When you remove the last, play it without paying its mana cost.)
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手弃三张牌。 延缓4～{B}（除了从你手上使用此牌，你可以支付{B}并将此牌移出对战，且上面有四个计时指示物。 在你的维持开始时，从其上移去一个计时指示物。 当你移去最后一个时，则使用它且不需支付其法术力费用。）

trans-unit.source: Nether Traitor
trans-unit.target: 阴间叛徒

trans-unit.resname: TSP·120 | Nether Traitor | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Haste\nShadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)\nWhenever another creature is put into your graveyard from play, you may pay {B}. If you do, return CARDNAME from your graveyard to play.
trans-unit.target: 敏捷 次元幽影（此生物只能阻挡具次元幽影异能的生物，亦只能被具此异能的生物阻挡。） 每当另一个生物从场上置入你的坟墓场时，你可以支付{B}。 若你如此作，则将CARDNAME从你的坟墓场返回场上。

trans-unit.source: Nightshade Assassin
trans-unit.target: 龙葵杀手

trans-unit.resname: TSP·121 | Nightshade Assassin | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: First strike\nWhen CARDNAME comes into play, you may reveal X black cards in your hand. If you do, target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn.\nMadness {1}{B} (If you discard this card, you may play it for its madness cost instead of putting it into your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 先攻 当CARDNAME进场时，你可以从你手上展示X张黑色牌。 若你如此作，则目标生物得-X/-X直到回合结束。 疯魔{1}{B}（如果你弃掉此牌，可以改为使用它并支付其疯魔费用，而非直接将它置入你的坟墓场。）

trans-unit.source: Phthisis
trans-unit.target: 痨病

trans-unit.source: Destroy target creature. Its controller loses life equal to its power plus its toughness.\nSuspend 5—{1}{B} (Rather than play this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{B} and remove it from the game with five time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When you remove the last, play it without paying its mana cost.)
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标生物。 其操控者失去等同于其力量与防御力加总的生命。 延缓5～{1}{B}（除了从你手上使用此牌，你可以支付{1}{B}并将此牌移出对战，且上面有五个计时指示物。 在你的维持开始时，从其上移去一个计时指示物。 当你移去最后一个时，则使用它且不需支付其法术力费用。）

trans-unit.source: Pit Keeper
trans-unit.target: 暗渊门卫

trans-unit.resname: TSP·123 | Pit Keeper | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, if you have four or more creature cards in your graveyard, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，若你的坟墓场中有四张或更多生物牌，则你可以将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.source: "The undead are not 'awakened.' They are evicted when there is no room left in the pit for more bodies."
trans-unit.target: 「不死生物并非给『唤醒』。它们是因暗渊挤不下新尸体而被赶出来的。」

trans-unit.source: Plague Sliver
trans-unit.target: 疫病裂片妖

trans-unit.resname: TSP·124 | Plague Sliver | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: All Slivers have "At the beginning of your upkeep, this creature deals 1 damage to you."
trans-unit.target: 所有裂片妖具有「在你的维持开始时，此生物对你造成1点伤害。」

trans-unit.source: A sliver shares everything with its hive—even its afflictions.
trans-unit.target: 裂片妖与母巢分享一切～连苦恼也不例外。

trans-unit.source: Premature Burial
trans-unit.target: 仓卒掩埋

trans-unit.resname: TSP·125 | Premature Burial | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy target nonblack creature that came into play since your last turn ended.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标非黑色生物，且须为你上个回合结束后进场者。

trans-unit.source: "This soil knows well the taste of the dead. Give it the hunger for a living meal, and it can become a deadly ally."\n—Ezrith, druid of the Dark Hours
trans-unit.target: 「这土壤熟知死者的气味。 若点醒它生食的欲望，便可成为强力盟友。」 ～黯刻德鲁伊易季司

trans-unit.source: Psychotic Episode
trans-unit.target: 丧神片段

trans-unit.resname: TSP·126 | Psychotic Episode | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Target player reveals his or her hand and the top card of his or her library. You choose a card revealed this way. That player puts the chosen card on the bottom of his or her library.\nMadness {1}{B} (If you discard this card, you may play it for its madness cost instead of putting it into your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手展示其手牌与其牌库顶牌。 你选择以此法展示的一张牌。 该牌手将此牌置于其牌库底。 疯魔{1}{B}（如果你弃掉此牌，可以改为使用它并支付其疯魔费用，而非直接将它置入你的坟墓场。）

trans-unit.source: Sangrophage
trans-unit.target: 血饮非

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, tap CARDNAME unless you pay 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，除非你支付2点生命，否则横置CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: The living is all it eats.
trans-unit.target: 活的它都吃。

trans-unit.source: Sengir Nosferatu
trans-unit.target: 辛格氏吸血妖

trans-unit.resname: TSP·128 | Sengir Nosferatu | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\n{1}{B}, Remove CARDNAME from the game: Put a 1/2 black Bat creature token with flying into play. It has "{1}{B}, Sacrifice this creature: Return to play under its owner's control a card named CARDNAME that's removed from the game."
trans-unit.target: 飞行 {1}{B}，将CARDNAME移出对战：将一个1/2黑色，具飞行异能的蝙蝠衍生物放置进场。 它具有「{1}{B}，牺牲此生物：将一张名称为CARDNAME、且被移出对战的牌在其拥有者的操控下移回场上。」

trans-unit.source: Skittering Monstrosity
trans-unit.target: 掠行巨兽

trans-unit.resname: TSP·129 | Skittering Monstrosity | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When you play a creature spell, sacrifice CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用生物咒语时，牺牲CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: Most living things were weakened and stunted in the ruinous aftermath of the Phyrexian invasion, but a few grew more horrid than ever.
trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚大侵攻所引致的摧毁性影响，让许多生灵变得衰弱而瘦小，但少数却变得更加奇形可怖。

trans-unit.source: Skulking Knight
trans-unit.target: 隐匿骑士

trans-unit.resname: TSP·130 | Skulking Knight | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)\nWhen CARDNAME becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.
trans-unit.target: 侧面攻击（每当一个不具侧面攻击之生物阻挡此生物时，该阻挡生物得-1/-1直到回合结束。） 当CARDNAME成为咒语或异能的目标时，将它牺牲。

trans-unit.source: Smallpox
trans-unit.target: 小片毒疹

trans-unit.source: Each player loses 1 life, discards a card, sacrifices a creature, then sacrifices a land.
trans-unit.target: 每位牌手失去1点生命，弃一张牌，牺牲一个生物，然后牺牲一个地。

trans-unit.source: "Great losses often bring only a numb shock. To truly plunge a victim into misery, you must overwhelm him with many small sufferings."\n—Ratadrabik of Urborg
trans-unit.target: 「巨大损失通常只教人惊呆。 要真正将人拉进痛苦深渊，必须用许多小型痛楚让他没顶。」 ～乌尔博格的拉塔札比

trans-unit.source: Strangling Soot
trans-unit.target: 窒息煤烟

trans-unit.resname: TSP·132 | Strangling Soot | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Destroy target creature with toughness 3 or less.\nFlashback {5}{R} (You may play this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then remove it from the game.)
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标防御力等于或小于3的生物。 返照{5}{R}（你可以从你的坟墓场使用此牌，并支付其返照费用， 然后将它移出对战。）

trans-unit.source: "What good is your blade without your breath?"\n—Greht, Gathan warlord
trans-unit.target: 「你若断了气，还斩得了谁？」 ～迦沙的军阀给特

trans-unit.source: Stronghold Overseer
trans-unit.target: 城塞督军

trans-unit.resname: TSP·133 | Stronghold Overseer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nShadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)\n{B}{B}: Creatures with shadow get +1/+0 until end of turn and creatures without shadow get -1/-0 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 次元幽影（此生物只能阻挡具次元幽影异能的生物，亦只能被具此异能的生物阻挡。） {B}{B}：直到回合结束，具次元幽影异能的生物得+1/+0，不具次元幽影异能的生物得-1/-0。

trans-unit.source: Its venom induces a fever that causes its victims to relive the attack in recurring, haunting visions.

trans-unit.source: "A rumor passes among the snakes, whispered by the rushes, inspiring the seekers: the goddess Freyalise is alive in Skyshroud."
trans-unit.target: 「有个谣言在蛇间流传，河流窃语，振奋了寻碧者：妃雅丽兹女神好端端地待在天帷。」

trans-unit.source: Time rifts bring tunneling beasts of old into the hard, dry earth of the present. Most die there, trapped, but the mightiest burst through the surface.
trans-unit.target: 时间裂缝将古代野兽拉到现代的硬厚枯干土壤中。 大多数不是死掉便是受困其间，只有最强力的才得以破土而出。

trans-unit.source: Long ago, the solitary gnarr was a sign of good luck. Now they have become wild pack hunters, a sign of impending danger.
trans-unit.target: 很久以前，独行的嚎龙曾被看作祥兆。 现在他们已是成群行猎的野物，象征了危难将至。

trans-unit.source: "The colossal thing rumbled over the ridge, tree husks crumbling before it. The ones we were already fighting howled as it came, their muscles suddenly surging, and we knew it was time to flee."\n—Llanach, Skyshroud ranger

trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME comes into play, choose a color.\nWhenever a player plays a spell of the chosen color, you may gain 1 life.\n{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进场时，选择一种颜色。 每当牌手使用该色的咒语时，你可以获得1点生命。 {T}：加一点该色的法术力到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: A last wisp of paradise in a fallen world.
trans-unit.target: 天堂在破败世界中仅留此一缕。

trans-unit.source: Phyrexian Totem
trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚图腾像

trans-unit.resname: TSP·261 | Phyrexian Totem | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.\n{2}{B}: CARDNAME becomes a 5/5 black Horror artifact creature with trample until end of turn.\nWhenever CARDNAME is dealt damage, if it's a creature, sacrifice that many permanents.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{B}到你的法术力池中。 {2}{B}：CARDNAME成为5/5黑色，具践踏异能的惊惧兽神器生物直到回合结束。 每当CARDNAME兽到伤害时，若它是生物，则你牺牲等量的永久物。

trans-unit.source: Prismatic Lens
trans-unit.target: 虹彩透镜

trans-unit.resname: TSP·262 | Prismatic Lens | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.\n{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。 {1}，{T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: It bends not light but mana, aligning its chaotic currents into the sharp angles necessary for the mystic's purposes.
trans-unit.target: 它所扭曲者并非光线，而是法术力，依秘教徒之需求将其混沌流向调校至适当锐角。

trans-unit.resname: TSP·263 | Sarpadian Empires, Vol. VII | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sarpadian Empires, Vol. VII
trans-unit.target: 撒尔帕汀帝国，卷 七

trans-unit.resname: TSP·263 | Sarpadian Empires, Vol. VII | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME comes into play, choose white Citizen, blue Camarid, black Thrull, red Goblin, or green Saproling.\n{3}, {T}: Put a 1/1 creature token of the chosen color and type into play.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进场时，选择白色市民，蓝色卡马利，黑色索尔兽，红色精灵，或绿色腐生物。 {3}，{T}：将一个所选择的颜色与种类之1/1衍生物放置进场。

trans-unit.resname: TSP·263 | Sarpadian Empires, Vol. VII | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The past still lives within its pages, waiting for its time to come again.
trans-unit.target: 过往依旧活在纸页间，等待再现的时机。

trans-unit.source: Stuffy Doll
trans-unit.target: 填充娃娃

trans-unit.resname: TSP·264 | Stuffy Doll | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
As CARDNAME comes into play, choose a player.
CARDNAME is indestructible.
Whenever damage is dealt to CARDNAME, it deals that much damage to the chosen player.
{T}: CARDNAME deals 1 damage to itself.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进场时，选择一位牌手。 CARDNAME不会毁坏。 每当CARDNAME受到伤害时，它对该牌手造成等量的伤害。 {T}：CARDNAME对本身造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Thunder Totem
trans-unit.target: 雷霆图腾像

trans-unit.resname: TSP·265 | Thunder Totem | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.\n{1}{W}{W}: CARDNAME becomes a 2/2 white Spirit artifact creature with flying and first strike until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{W}到你的法术力池中。 {1}{W}{W}：CARDNAME成为2/2白色，具飞行与先攻异能的精怪神器生物直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Triskelavus
trans-unit.target: 三节兽

trans-unit.source: Flying\nCARDNAME comes into play with three +1/+1 counters on it.\n{1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from CARDNAME: Put a 1/1 Triskelavite artifact creature token with flying into play. It has "Sacrifice this creature: This creature deals 1 damage to target creature or player."
trans-unit.target: 飞行 CARDNAME进场时上面有三个+1/+1指示物。 {1}，从CARDNAME上移去一个+1/+1指示物：将一个1/1，具飞行异能的三分节神器生物衍生物放置进场。 它具有「牺牲此生物：此生物对目标生物或牌手造成1点伤害。」

trans-unit.source: Venser's Sliver
trans-unit.target: 凡瑟的裂片妖

trans-unit.source: Venser admired his handiwork and smiled. His first prototype had joined with the hive mind all too well, running with the brood and becoming a predator itself. This one, he thought, would be accepted into the hive but still obey his commands.
trans-unit.target: 凡瑟欣赏着自己的作品，满意地笑了。 他的首批原型作品早已混入母巢意识，分享同样的血脉，也顺利成为掠食者。 至于这一个，他认为将能为母巢接受，但依旧会服从自己的命令。

trans-unit.source: Weatherseed Totem
trans-unit.target: 晴苗图腾像

trans-unit.resname: TSP·268 | Weatherseed Totem | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.\n{2}{G}{G}{G}: CARDNAME becomes a 5/3 green Treefolk artifact creature with trample until end of turn.\nWhen CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from play, if it was a creature, return this card to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{G}到你的法术力池中。 {2}{G}{G}{G}：CARDNAME成为5/3绿色，具践踏异能的树妖神器生物直到回合结束。 当CARDNAME从场上置入坟墓场时，若它当时是生物，则将此牌移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: Academy Ruins
trans-unit.target: 大学院废墟

trans-unit.resname: TSP·269 | Academy Ruins | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.\n{1}{U}, {T}: Put target artifact card in your graveyard on top of your library.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。 {1}{U}，{T}：将目标神器牌从你的坟墓场置于你的牌库顶。

trans-unit.source: Its secrets once wrought the greatest artifice ever known. Now crabs loot the rubble to decorate their shells.
trans-unit.target: 其间秘密曾雕琢出不二奇械。 尔今螃蟹捞捡其间瓦砾来装饰外壳。

trans-unit.target: {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。 {1}，{T}：在CARDNAME上放置一个储藏指示物。 {1}，从CARDNAME上移去X个储藏指示物：加X点法术力到你的法术力池中，且为{W}和／或{U}的任意组合。

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.\nWhen CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from play, you may search your library for a Plains card and put it into play tapped. If you do, shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{W}到你的法术力池中。 当CARDNAME从场上进入坟墓场时，你可以从你的牌库中搜寻一张平原牌，并将它横置进场。 若你如此作，则将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: TSP·272 | Flagstones of Trokair | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Dust-spiked winds eroded the stones, but the ground where they had stood still holds power.
trans-unit.target: 石板早受饱含砂尘的风侵蚀，但所立之大地依旧充满力量。

trans-unit.target: 宝石洞穴

trans-unit.source: If CARDNAME is in your opening hand and you're not playing first, you may begin the game with CARDNAME in play with a luck counter on it. If you do, remove a card in your hand from the game.\n{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. If CARDNAME has a luck counter on it, instead add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: 若你起手的手牌包含了CARDNAME，且你并非先手，你可以让它在场来开始游戏，且上面有一个运气指示物。 若你如此作，将你手上一张牌移出对战。 {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。 如果CARDNAME上面有运气指示物，则改为加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: "They're still here?! The cockroach may have finally met its match."\n—Teferi
trans-unit.target: 「他们还在？ 看来蟑螂终于遇上了对手。」 ～泰菲力

trans-unit.source: Swarmyard
trans-unit.target: 暴群墓场

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.\n{T}: Regenerate target Insect, Rat, Spider, or Squirrel.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。 {T}：重生目标昆虫，老鼠，蜘蛛，或松鼠。

trans-unit.source: Where scavengers nest in hollowed-out rib cages and chittering crawlers peer from empty eye sockets, few dare to trespass.
trans-unit.target: 腐食者把胸腔啃得精光充当窝巢，吱叫爬行的东西从空荡的眼窝向外张望；少有人胆敢擅闯此地。

trans-unit.source: Terramorphic Expanse
trans-unit.target: 地塑旷野

trans-unit.resname: TSP·279 | Terramorphic Expanse | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Search your library for a basic land card and put it into play tapped. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: {T}，牺牲CARDNAME：从你的牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，并将之横置进场。 然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Take two steps north into the unsettled future, south into the unquiet past, east into the present day, or west into the great unknown.
trans-unit.target: 迈开两步，向北迈进动荡将来，向南则为无宁过往，向东步回眼下此刻，或向西踏入未知境地。

trans-unit.target: 克撒的工厂

trans-unit.source: "Though their ideals are leagues apart, Urza's and Mishra's creations have a surprising harmony with one another."\n—Tocasia, journal entry
trans-unit.target: 「虽然他俩的理念南辕北辙，克撒与米斯拉所造之物却高度地彼此呼应。」 ～托卡西雅的日志片段
